main event: An unidentified object was observed traveling at a high altitude with no sound or visible propulsion.
interesting points: The object stopped twice during its flight,The object made a sharp turn and headed in a different direction,It was observed for approximately 5 minutes,The object was as bright as a first magnitude star,The conclusion of the report suggested it was probably a balloon.
location: Atlantic Ocean, Unknown Region, Unknown Country
witness description: Unspecified observers, report appears to be from military sources
